Sentencas: In this article, electrolyte coating of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) based on yttria stabilized zirconia (YSZ) on Ni-YSZ cermet fuel cells anode in ethanol was investigated using pulsed constant voltage and DC electrophoretic deposition (EPD).
Titulo: Preparation of YSZ electrolyte coating on conducting porous Ni-YSZ cermet by DC and pulsed constant voltage electrophoretic deposition process for SOFCs applications

Sentencas: The NiO-YSZ substrate was prepared by hydraulic pressing of mixed YSZ, NiO and starch powders following pre-sintering at 1200 degrees C for 3 h. The NiO-YSZ composite was reduced in hydrogen atmosphere in order to produce Ni-YSZ cermet.
Titulo: Preparation of YSZ electrolyte coating on conducting porous Ni-YSZ cermet by DC and pulsed constant voltage electrophoretic deposition process for SOFCs applications

Sentencas: The suspension properties and EPD process parameters were investigated.
Titulo: Preparation of YSZ electrolyte coating on conducting porous Ni-YSZ cermet by DC and pulsed constant voltage electrophoretic deposition process for SOFCs applications

Sentencas: The YSZ electrolyte was sintered at 1350 degrees C for 4 h. The morphology of sintered YSZ electrolyte coating was investigated by scanning electron microscope (SEM) and optical microscopy (OM).
Titulo: Preparation of YSZ electrolyte coating on conducting porous Ni-YSZ cermet by DC and pulsed constant voltage electrophoretic deposition process for SOFCs applications

Sentencas: Results showed that dense and uniform coatings were deposited in ethanol with solid concentration of 10 g/L of YSZ, 0.5 g/L of iodine at distance of anode to cathode being 5 mm.
Titulo: Preparation of YSZ electrolyte coating on conducting porous Ni-YSZ cermet by DC and pulsed constant voltage electrophoretic deposition process for SOFCs applications

Sentencas: The thickness of YSZ electrolyte after 6 min of deposition with pulsed constant voltage and DC electrophoretic deposition were 20 and 88 +/- 1 mu m, respectively.
Titulo: Preparation of YSZ electrolyte coating on conducting porous Ni-YSZ cermet by DC and pulsed constant voltage electrophoretic deposition process for SOFCs applications
Preparation of YSZ electrolyte coating on conducting porous Ni-YSZ cermet by DC and pulsed constant voltage electrophoretic deposition process for SOFCs applications
Preparation of YSZ electrolyte coating on conducting porous Ni-YSZ cermet by DC and pulsed constant voltage electrophoretic deposition process for SOFCs applications
